title: Hackathon 2025
description: Join our annual 24-hour coding marathon to build innovative projects and win prizes!

title: Intro to Python Workshop
description: A beginner-friendly session to learn Python programming with hands-on exercises.

title: Machine Learning Symposium
description: Dive into the latest trends in machine learning with talks from academic and industry leaders.

title: Web Development Bootcamp
description: Learn HTML, CSS, and JavaScript to build your own website in this 3-day bootcamp.

title: CSC Code Repository
description: Access our open-source repository of student projects and contribute to collaborative coding.

title: Cybersecurity Awareness Seminar
description: Learn about online safety, encryption, and ethical hacking from cybersecurity professionals.

title: Game Development Jam
description: Create your own video game in a weekend-long game dev competition using Unity.

title: Big Data Analytics Workshop
description: Explore big data tools like Hadoop and Spark in this hands-on workshop for beginners.

title: CSC Mentorship Program
description: Pair up with senior students to guide you through your CS journey and career prep.

title: Cloud Computing Workshop
description: Get hands-on experience with AWS and learn the basics of cloud infrastructure.

title: Tech Career Fair
description: Connect with top tech companies and explore internship and job opportunities.

title: Open Source Contribution Guide
description: A step-by-step resource to help students contribute to open-source projects.

title: Mobile App Development Workshop
description: Build your first Android app using Kotlin in this interactive session.

title: CSC Study Group Kickoff
description: Join our weekly study groups to collaborate on coursework and prep for exams.

title: Blockchain Basics Seminar
description: Understand the fundamentals of blockchain technology and its applications.

title: CSC Newsletter Archive
description: Browse past newsletters for updates, tips, and highlights from the CSC community.
